original_title: Eestlased Kremlis – Nõukogude Liidu lagunemise lugu
overview: The film is using episodes filmed mainly at the Kremlin, Soviet Union's headquarters which enable to have a glance to world's most well-known political kitchen.
tagline: What led to the collapse of an empire that covered the sixth of the planet with its huge arsenals of nuclear weapons, one of the most powerful empires the world had ever seen?
title: The Collapse of The Soviet Union
